Package org.fluentjdbc

Interface DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,​SELF extends DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,​SELF>>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseBulkInsertBuilder, DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder, DbContextBuildInsertBuilder, DbContextBulkUpdateBuilder
    public interface DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,​SELF extends DatabaseBulkUpdatable<ENTITY,​SELF>>
    Fluently create a statement for a list of objects which updates values, ie INSERT or UPDATE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SELF setField​(String fieldName, Function<ENTITY,​Object> transformer)
      Adds a function that will be called for each object to get the value for PreparedStatement.setObject(int, Object) parameter for each row in the bulk update to extract the values for fieldName parameter
      default <VALUES extends List<?>>
      SELF      		 setFields​(List<String> fields, Function<ENTITY,​VALUES> values)
      Adds a list function that will be called for each object to get the value each of the corresponding parameters in the PreparedStatement
